Description: We are seeking a Junior Interior Designer/Architect with 1-3 years of experience in Interior Design or Architecture to join our team. Reporting to our Senior Interior Architect, you will play a crucial role in supporting our design projects. Your responsibilities will include assisting in the design process using software tools like Autocad, Sketchup, Enscape, V-ray, and Lumion, and contributing to the development of design concepts and drawings. This is an excellent opportunity to gain practical experience, refine your skills, and contribute to meaningful design projects. If you have a passion for design and are eager to grow in a collaborative environment, we invite you to apply.Skills
Skills:
Collaborate with the Senior Interior Architect to manage the design process, from concept development to project completion.
Assist in creating and refining design concepts and drawings, taking into account client feedback and specifications.
Provide support in addressing contractor inquiries and reviewing shop drawings for ongoing projects.
Work closely with the Senior Interior Architect, benefiting from mentorship, and contributing to project success.

A Bachelor's degree in Interior Design or Architecture.
1-3 years of experience in Interior Design or Architecture.
Knowledge of design software, including Autocad, Sketchup, Enscape, V-ray, and Lumion.
Kindly upload your CV and Porfolio when applying.
